title: A Dog Is Tearing Fortnite Apart - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.14.19
description:
Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://getquip.com/GAMES right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames

Gary and Greg gab about a bevy of THQ Nordic news and then get riled up about a Fortnite re-skin.
